title: Troll groups?
body: So, it appears the more I play, I start noticing groups of 2-3 trolls, pretty much every game now, premades. Doesn't really work out well when I do literally nothing but agree with the stupidity and then get reported for verbal harassment. Then I get a warning? I don't even Riot...

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure you automatically get a warning when your reported, but they make sure that each report isn't fake so you shouldn't be worried about punishment :)

And 2 - 3 trolls pretty much every game now ? Sheesh that sucks.
